website_summaries.verdict: You won't find a better value. Owners rave about this set's high quality and numerous features at such an affordable price.
pros: Features 7 different sized bags and purses designed to fit every baby need imaginable
Main bag has large primary compartment
cons: Zipper quality can be substandard on some units

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious with alot of pockets, delivery only took two days, and I received everything as shown in the picture. I'm happy! By the way, you may want to fold the changing pad so it'll fit into the back pocket. Mommy and baby will be stylish. Yeah.
customer_reviews.author: pleaseHERmental

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting another simply flimsy bag, but what I got was a world class top off the line bag. The material is perfect, like I mean if water is poured on the outside it doesn't soak through to the inside. Plus I got some many other useful pouches and a diaper changing mat. I love my bag!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of extra useful bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the main bag to transport pumping supplies, but I’m liking the extra pieces as well. I’ve replaced my old portable changing pad with this one because it’s bigger and I may start using one of the smaller bags as additional storage on the stroller. The main bag is plenty big enough to carry everything I need for pumping and then some plus the material wipes clean very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Steph P.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: The biggest reason I ordered this one was because of the organizer that was supposed to come with it to go inside the bag and it didn’t even come with one. Still debating returning it. The bag seems durable and easy to cleans it’s cute as well, but nothing differentiates it from the one I have now without the organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Emery

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had more time with this bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my 3rd child and I loved it. It has lots of room and came with all the extra bags which I loved, but my baby is barely 10 months and one of the straps are barely hanging on. With my 2 older kids I had their diaper bags till I didn’t need one anymore so for this one too be already wiping sucks. Wish it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful compartmental bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is one of the best purchase I've made it comes with so many pieces that my 2 year old uses on as her own personal purse it is easy to clean I just put it in the washing machine. It has tons of pockets so you can stay organize. It is big enough to put things in for 2 children The design is absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Nessie B

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use as a diaper bag I’m expecting in October. I wanted something that was big enough for all baby items extra outfits and all that good stuff and this was just perfect ! It has many storage pockets for organization , definitely don’t have to worry about an over crowded back. Lots of zipper pockets and the extra bags it bring is so useful. The material looks easy to wash , nice and thick I’m very excited to use. Also love how it clips right into the carriage worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Taisha Velez

customer_reviews.title: Big hit at Baby Shower
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, The mother to be was ecstatic over this bag. Bag is well made with plenty of room and compartments, The more neutral design made the father to be also happy. Would recommend to any mother to be or attendee of a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and durable diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the same diaper bag, gray with blue elephants, since my son was born. After two years, I wanted something just as durable, but that was more presentable and adult like. This bag is perfect! Super cute and all the Space I need for my son’s diapers, wipes, toys, etc. All If the extra little bags were a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Shaka

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE CAPACITY
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS DIAPER BAG, IT'S STORAGE CPACITY IS SUPER. I WOULD LOVE IT EVEN MORE IF IT HAD A ONE STRAP AND OPTION TO MAKE IT LONGER TO USE IT AS CROSSBODY..
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Cream colored and diaper pad indeed does not fit in he front pocket gracefully.
customer_reviews.text: Only slightly cheap-feeling. I'm sure once I put it to steady use, I'll break it in and it won't be so stiff. The other people are right: it is CREAM and black and I think it looks great. If it were white, it'd be easier to see the darker spots when it's put to constant use. I also agree with the others: I wish there was an extra fold in the diaper mat, or a larger pocket in the outside of the bag. It'd be much better if it fit in the front pocket instead of having to be put in he bib middle pocket. I'll get over it.
customer_reviews.author: sarahsalithTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new Mom and this diaper bag is fantastic. The amount of storage space is wonderful and all of the additional little bags are fabulous. I absolutely love the straps that allow you to hook it to a stroller. Plus, it's just a good looking bag. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it as a work bag... used it for a month and it is beginning to unravel at the connection point of the straps to the bag. It is very nice, I just have to reinforce it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, totally happy.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously can't beat the price for everything you get here. I just got it yesterday, so I can't comment on the durability. But it feels like it's going to hold up well. Pockets galore, and many smaller bags were included for even more organization. Which we all know is key when you're traveling with a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Krisi

customer_reviews.title: Bag big enough and organized for multiple children
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bag!!! Tons of space to keep everything organized. This is a great bag for multiple children. I do foster care and have 2 infants at the moment 10 month (boy) and 8months(girl) they are both on different formulas and one with special needs who I have to carry lots of medications with me everywhere I go. I have been looking for a bag large enough to carry everything but that doesn't look like I'm carrying a suitcase for about 6 months. I finally found it.
customer_reviews.author: crystal s.

customer_reviews.title: Defective pocket but still love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, perfect size and can easily find everything inside. However, when I received it one of the pockets on the inside wasn’t stitched properly. Therefore, I won’t be able to use it. Overall I do love the bag.
customer_reviews.author: England112

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST bag! So many pockets and room and makes ...
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST bag! So many pockets and room and makes it so easy to see everything in the bag (especially good for daddy! lol) And I love that it came with all the extra bags and the stroller strap/hooks since I have such a small stroller. Amazing quality for the price it looks no different than the high end bags. So all the people saying it's "cheaply made" lol. Those are the ghetto people hoping that they get a Skip Hop brand bag for cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter's baby shower. She loves it! Very stylish and can be wiped right off. She likes the smaller bags so everything can stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome that it comes with the stroller staps but would ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome that it comes with the stroller staps but would be nice if it had a cross body option as well Has tons of extra space to pack babies needs in a plus would be bottle cooler The changing mat is a good size would I be nice if it had its own pocket. A picture of the inside of the bag would I be nice
customer_reviews.author: Jess Burston

customer_reviews.title: Loved this! Got it as a last minute thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Got it as a last minute thing for our trip, and it is sooo roomy! Had enough room to carry all my baby stuff for my twins! I also love all the extra pockets for my IDs and travel documents. The bag looks great, as well!
customer_reviews.author: amz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. I haven't seen a bag like this at any store. Good buy for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy and attractive. Used as my work bag but then one of the side pockets ripped wide open. Only had it for 3 months. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The tear is pretty big so I can't repair it
customer_reviews.text: I had this diaper bag for 9 months, but now I'm shopping for its replacement. On the purse piece, some kind of staple or something is poking through and it's very sharp--it's drawn blood when I'm not mindful of it. Most recently there is a tear in the front zipper pouch (the recessive one, not the one that sticks out). The tear is pretty big so I can't repair it. The inner dividers are starting to pull away, too, at the seams. It served well but did not last.
customer_reviews.author: jk28

customer_reviews.title: Best Teacher Bag Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this as a diaper bag, but rather I use it as a teacher bag. It's amazing!! It fits a laptop, textbook, and my grading. I couldn't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Fisher

customer_reviews.title: I loved this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag! It held a lot, while being great for organization. It was easy to clean and I loved the pattern! I especially loved the extra small bags that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye ugly mom bag!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the most functional diaper bag I've owned! It's the perfect size and more fashionable than most. It has lots of pocket for organization. I'm using one of the extra bags as a quick grab diaper bag so my husband doesn't need to take my entire bag with him to change our little one! I can't believe the price too! As a mom of a 2, I would totally recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Waterproof fabric, stylish, useful pockets and a good size to hang from our uppababy stroller (comparable to the SkipHop bags). It doesn’t come with the inner bag organizer, instead they provide a change mat which we use all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie

customer_reviews.title: Don't be scared of the cheaper price - definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag for $28! I was looking at other diaper bags in the $100+ range and saw this one. Gave it a try for $28 knowing I could always return it. We are done shopping! Perfect bag, will hold all our stuff for our 2nd child. The pattern is not my absolute favorite, but considering its job is to hold food and diapers, I'm good to go. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mlcs

customer_reviews.title: 6 months in...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great bag...for 6 months. I'm now at 6 months of use and it now has a tear in one side and looks like the other side will have another tear soon 😦 It looked well made and of course was a great price for the pieces you got but I need at least a year out of it to make it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSEH

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag. I knocked 1 star off because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. I knocked 1 star off because the color of the white looked like a dirty ivory color. Otherwise lots of compartments and extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Its really big but I love it! Wish it came with a shoulder strap but ill just use one from another bag :) good material. Pretty design. Nice soft blue on the inside. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ash Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bag! Wish I found this with my first child. Love the individual bags, especially the purse for mom when the diaper bag is with the baby and the sitter, and mom is on her own. The wipe zipper case doesn't keep the wipes moist though, so you will need to put them in a water tight bag first. This is a great bag, lots of space, and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: A. Covey

customer_reviews.title: This was such a great purchase! I have had 3 diaper bags for ...
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great purchase! I have had 3 diaper bags for 3 children. This is a good material for carrying around everywhere. It wipes down easily. My favorite feature is the little purse. I put all my 'essentials' in there (wallet, chapstick, gum etc) and when I am running somewhere without kids or am running into a store with kids but only for a few items, I grab the purse and head on my way lighter and happier!
customer_reviews.author: bconnell30

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my on the go lifestyle! Great pockets easy to clean and stuff everything into !
customer_reviews.author: Pinky27

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great price
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this diaper bag!!! It is cute, holds everything, not too big and not too small. It comes with a little purse, a makeup bag, a bottle holder, a changing pad and another small bag. There are lots of separate compartments in the actual diaper bag. The price was great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It has everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!!! Super cute and very spacious...room for everything. I actually use it as my "teacher bag".
customer_reviews.author: Sara G.

customer_reviews.title: Received a dirty bag
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited about this, was nice and big. Looked great! Received the product and it was stained. Haven't gotten around to returning it, as it looks like it might be at my own cost, plus I have a new born. Kind of disappointed I didn't just get a new, non dirty bag.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like a Designer bag! :D
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most attractive diaper bags out there for an AMAZING price! It looks like designer with the designer price. EXTREMELY roomy and I love the smaller pieces that comes with the bag. It also comes with two straps so you can hang it behind the stroller :) Very good quality as well! Definitely one of the best buys on Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: HyeMama

customer_reviews.title: Great look, function and price
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and functionality. I've looked at lots of diaper bags and wanted a modern pattern, with good storage and organization, and at a good price. This bag meets all of these needs. edit: I've now had this 5 months & I use it every day. This is a very well made durable bag. It has a washable wipeable fabric, strong straps, and strong seams.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylene Barker

customer_reviews.title: Mommy and Baby Bag love it
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so nice and the storage is more than enough, this Babab is big enough for both of us
customer_reviews.author: moumou

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great buy! Very spacious, sturdy and still stylish enough. Holds so much and still doesn’t feel bulky. I can easily fit in everything that’s handy for my baby anywhere I am traveling and I haven’t even used all the pouches that come with it. It does feel a bit heavy when overly full so anyone with an issue carrying weight may want to go for a backpack style bag.
customer_reviews.author: Good Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I have already had many compliments, one being the nurse in the delivery room! This bag provides plenty of space for my baby's belongings. I am able to pack everything and more into this bag. It seems to be durable and for the most part has become my diaper bag/purse. The added compartments allows me to store everything my baby needs and allows me to stay organized! As a mother it is helpful to be organized and it doesn't hurt to also be in style!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Use it everyday
customer_reviews.text: Use this everyday ! Has many pockets for all my babys gas drops and rash cream and diapers . Really helped me make sure I have everything I need
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Vidnjvich

customer_reviews.title: GREAT diaper bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and search and read so many reviews before purchasing this bag. Love the interior organizing pockets and very roomy. Also has a great shoulder strap that actually stays on shoulder without constantly sliding off. Another great plus in the extra bags it comes with. I use one to store all my diapering essentials so I can just easily grab it out of bag.
customer_reviews.author: Maddlesmom

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected! Love the design, perfect size, and I love all the extra pieces that come with. Definitely a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute diaper set!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute diaper bag set! I wash able to put a pretty good amount of stuff in it and still had plenty of room!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie mcclung

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this diaper bag. We've had it for over a year and you wouldn't be able to tell. We cloth diaper and this bag is big enough to hold everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but needs some more structural strength
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Lots of pockets, looks classy, holds everything you need. Unfortunately, one of the straps broke - completely ripped out of the seams after less than a year of use. I wish there was a way to get just a replacement bag instead of the bag and all the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S

customer_reviews.title: The print is great and the quality is better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very roomy and will hold all the necessities for your baby as well as your items. The print is great and the quality is better than what I expected. If you are looking for black and white, the bag is more a cream and black. The stroller clips come in very handy aND it has tons of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Merrie

customer_reviews.title: the quality is pretty decent.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really look quite the same in person. the quality is pretty decent.. It does stain easily ..doesn't really wipe clean very well at all.. but for the price.. its a fair deal
customer_reviews.author: Gamma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the material is not what I expected, but everything arrived in perfect condition and has good compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Seco

customer_reviews.title: Stylish yet organized diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife because she needed a more organized yet stylish diaper bag. She really likes the design, the fact that it has a lot of storage, and the extra accessories. She is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. Works perfectly and has a lot of compartments for all my baby’s toys and essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister who's having her first child. She didn't know I was getting it and she absolutely fell in love with it, color and all.
customer_reviews.author: Klpcookie

customer_reviews.title: ... for 6 months now and it is still working perfect! I tend to overpack everything
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag for 6 months now and it is still working perfect! I tend to overpack everything, lol so this bag is perfect because it is very spacious and fashionable! I am amazed how much this bag holds! I also have spilt plenty of bottles in this bag and it still works great! Perfect price! You definitely will get your money's worth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very useful diaper bag. Used all the small pouches and changing station is super useful
customer_reviews.author: Kavita

customer_reviews.title: SoHo collection, Grand Central 7 pieces Diaper bag set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece after she had twins. I knew she would need something big. I was told after I ordered it that someone had already bought a designer diaper bag. I thought thats okay she can alway use another. This is the one she uses all time. Ever since I gave it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Warrington

customer_reviews.title: Not my main use bag. Too small
customer_reviews.text: Bag is smaller than expected. Will need to carry additional bag or carry less
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I love the designs of this diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the designs of this diaper bag! I haven't got to use it since my daughter isn't born yet, so I am unsure of how it will hold up in everyday use. The one thing that I noticed, and I am super picky on, is the lining of bags and this one is thin leading me to believe that it will probably not hold up very well if loaded extremely heavy. The outside of the bag is very durable it seems, and I love the design of the black and cream. I personally think it was worth the $26, especially because of the extra bags, and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Kayllie

customer_reviews.title: Large bag that holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: This bag is large and fits everything I need for my baby. I've also used the little bags that are included for things such as lip gloss and hand lotion. I've had it for almost 2 months and its held up well.
customer_reviews.author: S_Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect baby bag to have lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Love the new baby bag and love how it has so many other small bags included and now I can have everything I need all organized. It has a lot of space. I have no complaints at all. It’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: But this product looks better than the ones we looked at
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for daughter in law, the only issue is the changing pad, we have to purchase one with memory foam for our precious first grandchild. He will also need a little larger. But this product looks better than the ones we looked at, just need a little more function.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. I have loved it but am now having another baby and it was filthy. Put it in the washer for the second time since i have owned it for 2 years and it fell apart. Definately not as durable as some of the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: karla prestridge

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stylish bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my sister. She absolutely loves it! It's very stylish and has tons of compartments. She can fit so much in there. The wristlet and small purse like bag are perfect for mom's quick errand trips. It's easy to clean, straps are sturdy and fits great on the stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Nova Bean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comment from my wife: Bag is just as expected. Very lovely
customer_reviews.author: Nana Asiamah

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell and worst packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product meets expectation for the quality and size. But 3stars for the worst packaging and strong odor.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bag
customer_reviews.text: Good looking bag. I like that it comes with different pouches. It is very roomy and serves the purpose for a day trip or every day use for my 4month old son.
customer_reviews.author: Chintan Patel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fantastic goods and delivery Great service, great product, Item as expected, A+++
customer_reviews.author: Mariano Menéndez

customer_reviews.title: The bag looks nice, but I only had it for 4 days ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks nice, but I only had it for 4 days before the strap broke! It wasn’t even heavy as I only had a few items in the bag and I haven’t actually had our baby yet so I didn’t have any baby stuff in it. Not very impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: kaycee brunel

customer_reviews.title: It's actually nice but I didn't like the color or material much
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the little bags it has along! It's actually nice but I didn't like the color or material much. For this price I could of bought another brand with better material. Not that I've used it for 5 months it looks so used up!
customer_reviews.author: A.fahmy

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for the right bag for a yr now and just returned 2 new bags that were too small. This one's the right size, light weight, super stylish and inexpensive. The fabric on the inside is thin so avoid overloading it.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Ade

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Perfect size. And the Mom purse..so cute and perfect! I can fit what is needed in the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Calypso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter a year ago. Great brand, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lund

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Beyond my expectations. I'm expecting our 3rd child next month so I was looking for something big enough to store all their essentials along with tons of pockets to keep them seperated. This one takes the cake! The pattern I chose is also neutral enough that my husband said he wouldn't mind toting it around with the kids either. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Goff

customer_reviews.title: love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Such a great collection of bags! I love the variety of sizes and they have been really great for everyday use, daycare, holding milk and keeping it cold (with an ice pack that fit perfectly inside), and for my own personal items.
customer_reviews.author: P B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy diaper bag. My wife can fit everything into this bag with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deal ever!!! Just got the bag... It's huge very good quality, water proof and all the accessorie bags are big and great. I really didn't expect much for this price and I am super happy I got it!!!! Looks just like picture!
customer_reviews.author: naty

customer_reviews.title: No shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad looking. However the fact that there is no shoulder strap makes it difficult to use. Most people don't have an empty hand to hold the bag while dealing with a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didnt realize the color was cream & black, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Didnt realize the color was cream & black, but still very cute. I haven't actually used it yet because I haven't had my baby, but I feel that this set gives enough storage, room, compartments & options to set me up for success!
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and to be honest the only diaper bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and to be honest the only diaper bag I've bought that has not fallen apart! Love it! It's spacious and has lots to work with!!
customer_reviews.author: Vmendez91

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item as it includes extra bags for other small items even my purse items and I don't need to carry a extra bag plus it is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a baby shower gift from the moms baby registry. It looks like it will be easy to clean. It is light weight. I hope it is durable....time will tell on that...Overall, I am glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Kim Amador

customer_reviews.title: Chic and accessible
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a classy diaper bag with enough room for 2 under 2. Love this! Even cuter than expected and totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wolleybird

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! My friend loved it after I bought it for her baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: cyndi Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag! Has tons of pockets and extra little bags to separate stuff! Seems sturdy to hold up baby stuff for two babies!
customer_reviews.author: BNup

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but smelly
customer_reviews.text: The bag & accessories are nice, although I have only used a couple of times. One down side is the lining appears to be cheaply made & has a very strong plastic smell. I tried airing it out few several weeks before using, but it still smells & so does everything I carry in it.
customer_reviews.author: loves shoes

customer_reviews.title: I get a lot of comments on my diaper bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of comments on my diaper bag and plan to continue using it as an overnight bag once baby no longer needs it, don't have a need for all the other pieces but it's worth it for the bag alone
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great bag set and I love the different sizes because ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag set and I love the different sizes because they serve different needs for a new mom with a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Kia

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on this diaper bag set very durable has ...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on this diaper bag set very durable has lasted 2 years and still looks as though it's brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Aryann

customer_reviews.title: I really like these bags
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bags. Very strong and can pack the diaper bag full. I liked the design as well. The only issue i had was that it is more of an off white instead of white.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney H

customer_reviews.title: Bute, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, there is lot of room in it, and the accessories are a nice bonus, but the zipper broke and the handle broke both within the first 5 weeks. Now I have to spend the money on another one, and I'm not thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It holds everything with extra room. Easy to wipe clean and is super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Like skip hop studio used to be, almost
customer_reviews.text: For the price, very happy. Handles would be more comfy if flat. Otherwise it is amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Oleander

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Great options!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible value for the money. I received so many pieces I still haven't found what to do with all of them! The quality and detail is outstanding. I would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look! However, one of the straps broke after minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rees

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bag! Everything I wanted. It fits stuff so nice and has many organizing spaces/pockets. I especially like the large end pockets that can fit two cups for easy access!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love ....what a beautifully designed bag it has all the compartments I could ever need and more....just awesome
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it’s only been two weeks but I’m loving it. So much storage space and easy to use. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, lots of parts for organization and plenty of room! Love it!! Looks like a normal purse and gender neutral also. :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Burke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The momma to be loved this gift, and all the wonderful accessories that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

product_meta.title: SoHo Collection, Grand Central Station 7 pieces Diaper Bag set
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :15 x 13.5 x 2.5 inches; 2 Pounds
 * Manufacturer recommended age :1 month and up
 * Item model number :sohoHYT823
 * Date First Available :January 19, 2014
 * Manufacturer :SoHo Designs
 * ASIN :B00HY0NXJ4

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #3,643 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby)  *  #31 inDiaper Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars548 ratings
feature_bullets: 7-PIECE COMPLETE SET — Includes (1) diaper bag, (2) personal purse w carrying strap, (3) changing pad, (4) accessories bag, (5) organizer bag w mesh top, (6) insulated bottle bag, (7) stroller straps

QUALITY MATERIALS — Made from multilayered fabrics that are waterproof and stain resistant. Easily clean the surface or interior with a wipe. For more serious dirt and stains, machine wash cold and hang dry. All hardware and seams are reinforced for a long lasting bag that still looks new after repeated use.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL — Mix and match the parts of the set for each trip, whether going to daycare, work, or a day out. The main compartment is large enough to fit breast pump, extra diapers, bottles, wipes, etc. Many small pockets make sure you stay organized. The durable and stain resistant material means you don't need to worry about damaging it while on the go. SoHo's Grand Central Station diaper bag is versatile and can keep up with you. Usable as tote, purse, stroller attachment, travel bag.

DESIGNED BY PARENTS FOR PARENTS — Each compartment and set item in this diaper bag set is designed to simplify your life as a parent. One extra large compartment fits your largest items while small pockets ensure you stay organized. SoHo's Grand Central Station Diaper Bag stands upright for easy access to main compartment while changing diapers for your little one. Centrally attached stroller straps lets the diaper bag hang straight down for easy access while attached to a stroller.

12-MONTH WARRANTY & SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – All our bags come with at least a 12-month warranty as we are confident of our bags' quality and workmanship. If you ever have any issues, please reach out and we will make sure to make things right.
